doc.field: Net 3,563,000 vs 2,821,000 Sales 318.6 mln vs 305.4 mln Year Net 28,950,000 vs 20,167,000 Sales 1.22 billion vs 1.17 billion Note: Company is a subsidiary of Bayer AG of West Germany. 1986 figures exclude Miles' Bayvet animal health business, sold Jan. 1, 1986, to Mobay Corp, another Bayer AG affiliate. Reuter
